line_1: We reach at length the drawing-room,
All fresh and fragrant, to the Drawing-Room:
line_2: Pay their last Duty to the Court, and come

line_1: To sing the full, dull Drawing-room.
line_2: Yet, in a lower note, presume

line_1: Q draws her train along the drawing-room.
line_2: Behold, K struts as might a king become;
On some adventure shou'd she come,
